title: Potomac Heritage National Scenic Trail: Get Involved
body: Explore This Park    Get Involved           Get Involved       Since authorized in 1983, the PHT -- as a vision  and physical trail network -- has evolved and continues to evolve. You can be part of this evolution by working with PHT management partners, by participating in volunteer opportunities, and by participating in NPS planning projects as well as projects that affect the development, character and experience of PHT segments.              NPS Centennial with the PHT Network   Celebrate National Park Service Centennial events with the Potomac Heritage National Scenic Trail all year long.            Volunteer   There are opportunities across the entire Trail to get involved and volunteer.        Planning   Planning documents specific to the Potomac Heritage National Scenic Trail.            Partners   Get involved and find out which partners are near you along the Trail.           Celebrate the National Park Services 100th Birthday along the Potomac Heritage National Scenic Trail NPS Photo / Copenhaver & Guell
